snippet.title: Police search uncovers Eden Waugh murder evidence
snippet.content: A large scale police search has uncovered a number of items homicide detectives believe to be connected to the murder of Eden Waugh. ACT Policing said the items found at White Rocks in Karabar would undergo forensic analysis.Photo: Supplied The search on Sunday involved the Australian Federal Police officers, police divers, NSW police, ACT emergency services and State Emergency Service volunteers. Police said a reward of up to $1000 was available for any information leading to an arrest or solving the crime. Anyone with information relating to Mr Waugh's murder was urged to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or via the .
